柴胡: bupleurum root {Chinese thorowax root, Bupleuri Radix}

{美國}疾病防制中心: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention {=CDC}

青皮: green tangerine peel {Citri Reticulatae Pericarpium Viride}

危害分析重要管制點: Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points {=HACCP}

麻疹、腮腺炎及德國麻疹混合疫苗: measles, mumps and rubella virus vaccine, live {=MMR}

抗出血性蛇毒多價血清 {龜殼花及赤尾鮐}: polyvalent hemorrhagic antivenin-Trimeresurus mucrosquamatus and Trimeresurus gramineus

抗神經性蛇毒多價血清 {雨傘節及飯匙倩}: polyvalent neurotoxic antivenin-Bungarus multicinctus and Naja naja atra

刺五加: prickly acanthopanax {Acanthopanacis Senticosi Radix et Caulis}

車前子: psyllium seed {plantago seed, plantain seed} {Plantaginis Semen}

德國麻疹及腮腺炎活病毒混合疫苗: rubella and mumps virus vaccine live

碘化汞砷溶液: solution of arsenious and mercuric iodide

化粧品衛生管理條例: Statute for Control of Cosmetic Hygiene

管制藥品管理條例: Statute for the Control of Controlled Drugs

無菌眼耳鼻用液劑: sterile eye, ear and nose solutions

無菌眼耳鼻用懸液劑: sterile eye, ear and nose suspensions

鉤藤: uncaria stem and thorn {Uncariae Ramulus cum Uncis}

美國食品藥物管理局: US Food and Drug Administration {=US FDA}

美國藥典國民處方集: USP-NF {The United States Pharmacopeia and The National Formulary}

冬瓜: wax gourd {white gourd, white melon, winter gourd, Benincasae}
